definitions.title: n.pr.loc. 1.
definitions.body: [[רְחׂבׂת עִיר]] near Nineveh Ge 10:11 (J), th=n Rowbwv[q] po/lin; Dl:Pa 261 cf. As. rêbit Ninâ, but v. COT:Ge 10:11.
[[רְחׂבוֹת]], name of well Ge 26:22 (J), Eu)ruxwri/a (cf. interpr. v:Ge 26:22); Palmer:Desert 296 f. identif. with er-Ruḥaibeh (in Wady R.) c. 45 m. SW. of Hebron, N. of lat. 31°.
[[הַנׇּהָר]] ´[[ר]]:, home of a king of Edom Ge 36:37 (P) = 1Ch 1:48, Rowbwq th=v para\ potamo/n, P. tou= potamou= (i.e. on Euphrates ? here improb.; conj. in Di Holz Wkl:Gesch. Isr. i. 192).
